home.tagline: Borrow and return school devices. Sign up or sign in to get started.
home.rolesHint: Students: borrow devices. Admins: use any email; add it to NEXT_PUBLIC_ADMIN_EMAILS in .env.local or set role in Supabase to access the admin dashboard.

signup.title: Create your account
signup.subtitle: Sign up with a valid email address. You'll verify your email to get started.
signup.success: Check your email to confirm your account.

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.passwordSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
errors.authError: Sign-up failed. Please try again or use a different email.
errors.configError: Sign-up is not configured. Please contact support.

signin.title: Sign in
signin.subtitle: Sign in with your email and password.

errors.authError: Sign-in failed. Check your email and password.
